  • Method Details

    • changeScene

      public void changeScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Changes the scene to the primary scene. Loads the primary scene FXML file and sets it as the current scene.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent object representing the event of the button press.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the FXML file

    • btnActionIngredients

      void btnActionIngredients(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the button action for the ingredients category. Sets the category to ingredients and adjusts visibility of UI elements accordingly. Populates the VBox with ingredients data retrieved from the database.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent object representing the event of the button press.

    • btnActionInMenu

      void btnActionInMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the button action for the menu category. Sets the category to menu_item and adjusts visibility of UI elements accordingly. Populates the VBox with menu item data retrieved from the database.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent object representing the event of the button press.

    • btnActionInDrink

      void btnActionInDrink(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the button action for the drinks category. Sets the category to drinks and adjusts visibility of UI elements accordingly. Populates the VBox with drink data retrieved from the database.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent object representing the event of the button press.

    • populateVBoxWithQueryResults

      private void populateVBoxWithQueryResults(String query)
      Populates the VBox with query results based on the given SQL query. Clears the existing content in the VBox and populates it with data retrieved from the database.
      Parameters:
      query - The SQL query to retrieve data from the database.

    • setFieldsVisibility

      private void setFieldsVisibility(boolean nameVisible, boolean priceVisible, boolean newStockVisible, boolean minStockVisible, boolean submitVisible)
      Sets the visibility of various UI elements. Controls which UI elements are visible based on the parameters.
      Parameters:
      nameVisible - Visibility of the nameTextField.
      priceVisible - Visibility of the priceTextField.
      newStockVisible - Visibility of the newStockTextField.
      minStockVisible - Visibility of the minStockTextField.
      submitVisible - Visibility of the submitItemBtn.

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears all input fields. Resets the text content of all input fields to empty strings.

    • getSelectedRadioButton

      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton getSelectedRadioButton()
      Retrieves the selected radio button from the VBox. Iterates through the children of the VBox to find the selected radio button.
      Returns:
      The selected RadioButton object, or null if none is selected.

    • priceButtonAction

      void priceButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the price button is clicked. Updates the price of the selected item in the database based on user input.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent object representing the event of the button press.

    • stockBtnAction

      void stockBtnAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the stock button is clicked. Updates the stock of the selected item in the database based on user input.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent object representing the event of the button press.

    • newItemBtn

      void newItemBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the new item button is clicked. Adds a new item to the database based on user input.
      Parameters:
      event - An ActionEvent object representing the event of the button press.

    • refreshVBox

      private void refreshVBox()
      Refreshes the VBox to update information. Refreshes the content of the VBox based on the current category.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
